data.title: State Police, Maryland Department of
data.text:
LAW ENFORCEMENT COORDINATING COUNCIL

Staff: David A. Engel (443) 436-8800; e-mail: david.engel@maryland.gov

Chair: Col. Roland L. Butler, Jr., Secretary of State Police

Ex officio: Russell J. Strickland, Secretary of Emergency Management; Jacob R. Day, Secretary of Housing & Community Development; Rafael J. Lopez, Secretary of Human Services; Vincent N. Schiraldi, Secretary of Juvenile Service; Carolyn C. Scruggs, Secretary of Public Safety & Correctional Services; Dorothy J. Lennig, Esq., Executive Director, Governor's Office of Crime Prevention & Policy; David A. Engel, Director, Criminal Intelligence Section; Col. Jerome E. Howard Jr., Chief, Maryland Transit Administration Police; Lt. Col. Joseph F. Scott, Jr., Acting Chief, Maryland Transportation Authority Police; Michael Anzallo, Chief, Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority Police; Craig A. Robertson, Sheriff, Allegany County; Amal E. Awad, Chief of Police, Anne Arundel County; Richard J. Worley, Jr., Police Commissioner, Baltimore City; Robert O. McCullough, Chief of Police, Baltimore County; Richard Cox, Sheriff, Calvert County; Donald L. Baker, Jr., Sheriff, Caroline County; James T. DeWees, Sheriff, Carroll County; Scott A. Adams, Sheriff, Cecil County; Troy D. Berry, Sheriff, Charles County; James W. Phillips, Jr., Sheriff, Dorchester County; David Benjamin, Acting Sheriff, Frederick County; Bryson Meyers, Sheriff, Garrett County; Jeffrey R. Gahler, Sheriff, Harford County; Marcus Harris, Chief of Police, Howard County; Dennis W. Hickman, Jr., Sheriff, Kent County; Capt. Marcus G. Jones, Chief of Police, Montgomery County; Malik Aziz, Chief of Police, Prince George's County; R. Gery Hofmann III, Sheriff, Queen Anne's County; Steve A. Hall, Sheriff, St. Mary's County; Ronald W. Howard, Sheriff, Somerset County; Joseph J. Gamble, Sheriff, Talbot County; Brian K. Albert, Sheriff, Washington County; Michael A. Lewis, Sheriff, Wicomico County; Matthew Crisafulli, Sheriff, Worcester County; Edward C. Jackson, Chief of Police, Annapolis; Ross C. Buzzuro, Chief of Police, Ocean City.

Reginald A. Lawson, Senior Advisor for State & Local Law Enforcement Partnership

VEHICLE THEFT PREVENTION COUNCIL

(W00A0108, formerly Q00A0103, formerly 35.01.01.03)

FY2024 appropriation: $3,265,403

Christopher T. McDonold, Executive Director (appointed by Governor) (410) 386-3015; 1-800-96-THEFT (toll free)

e-mail: christopher.mcdonold@maryland.gov

fax: (410) 386-3003

web: www.mdautotheft.org/

Chair (chosen by Governor): Col. Roland L. Butler, Jr., Secretary of State Police

Appointed by Governor to 3-year terms: Marjorie Coyne, 2022; Victor E. Epps, 2022; Phillip V. Lee, Sr., 2022; James V. Aluisi, 2023; Martin A. Hammond III, 2023; Scott D. Shellenberger, Esq., 2023; Harvey R. Baker, 2024; Larry E. Hinton, Esq., 2024; Neil N. Schachter, 2024.
